definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: A good seaman is known in bad weather.
He best can pity who has felt the woe.
sentences.chinese: 曾歷憂傷者方知憐憫他人。

sentences.english: When the Well's dry, we know the Worth of Water.
No one knows the value of health until he loses it.
sentences.chinese: 直到失去了健康，人們方知健康的重要性。

sentences.english: Pay what you owe, and you'll know what's your own.
sentences.chinese: 付清你所欠下的債，方知什麼是屬於自己的。

sentences.english: A man is known by the group he keeps.
sentences.chinese: 是其所交之友，方知其爲人也。

sentences.english: Later, the monks explained to him, Fang know it is tide water.
sentences.chinese: 後來僧人跟他解釋，方知這是潮信。

sentences.english: Person if be forced matchless place, the square knows that the face didn't exist magnitude.
sentences.chinese: 人若是被逼到絕處，方知臉面並沒有生存重要。

sentences.english: Under the way know the new supervisor is, please.
sentences.chinese: 一問之下方知是主管請來的新人。

sentences.english: He knows the water best who has waded through it.
sentences.chinese: 涉足河水者，方知水深淺。

sentences.english: We'll never know the worth of water till the well goes dry.
Till our own weakness shows us what we are.
sentences.chinese: 直到心力交瘁，方知自己是誰。

sentences.english: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
Misfortunes tells us what fortune is.
sentences.chinese: 惡運臨頭後，方知幸運貴。

sentences.english: Fell in the loneliness, lonely lonely is more difficult than we know, even more tired.
sentences.chinese: 淪陷於寂寞裏，方知寂寞比孤獨更難熬，更令人疲憊。

definition: suddenly and completely (realize, change one's strategy etc)
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
not more than so-so (idiom); mediocre/nothing out of the ordinary
as they say, .../as the saying goes, ...
